Posts.Content: May 23, 2008 03:11PM newfie wrote: HI. I AM NEW TO THIS SIGHT. I AM OUT 3 YEARS FROM TREATMENT. DX. IN 2004 AND HAD 3 LUMPECTOMIES. I HAVE A SEROMA/HEMATOMA. IT HAS BEEN ASPIRATED 3 TIMES AND STILL VERY LARGE IN SIZE. AT TIMES, IT IS VERY PAINFUL, NOT RED, BUT PAINFUL. IT FEELS LIKE A VERY LUMPY MASS. THEY CONTINUE TO DO MAMMO AND ULTRASOUNDS AND SAY, IT IS NOTHING. I AM HAVING A MRI TO CHECK IT OUT BETTER. THERE IS ALSO, SOMETHING IN THE MIDDLE, TISSUE, ETC. [I AM TOLD]. IT HAS NOT GONE DOWN IS SIZE AND I HAVE MORE PAIN NOW, THEN WHEN, I HAD THE LUMPECTOMIES. I ALSO, HAD THE SENTINEL NODES DONE, THEY ONLY GOT ONE AND THAT WAS NEGATIVE. I WAS STAGE 2 AND ESTROGEN/PROGESTRINE POSITIVE. DID 12 WEEKS OF  CHEMO AND  33 TREATMENTS OF RADIATION. NO ONE CAN REALLY GIVE ME AN ANSWER TO THIS SEROMA/HEMATOMA, EXCEPT THAT IT IS THERE. I KNOW, SURGEONS DO NOT LIKE TO RE-OPERATE ON RADIATED SKIN, DUE TO HEALING PROBLEMS. ANY SUGGESTIONS? FOR NOW, THEY JUST ARE WATCHING THIS THING, EVERY 6 MONTHS. THANKS, SUE
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy now a seroma? Info needed gogators sunangel27
